mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, author, create_dt, delete_yn, hit) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{author}, now(), 'N', 0)
mapper.select: select id, title, content, author, create_dt, update_dt, delete_yn, hit from board where delete_yn = 'N' order by id desc
select id, title, content, author, create_dt, update_dt, delete_yn, hit from board where id = #{id} and delete_yn = 'N'

select id, title, content, author, create_dt, update_dt, delete_yn, hit from board where (title like '%'||#{kw}||'%' or content like '%'||#{kw}||'%' or author like '%'||#{kw}||'%') and delete_yn = 'N' order by id desc limit #{size} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from board where (title like '%'||#{kw}||'%' or content like '%'||#{kw}||'%' or author like '%'||#{kw}||'%') and delete_yn = 'N'
